mapper.insert: insert into FUND_UNIT_FALLBACK_ORG (SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, FALLBACKTYPE, COMPENSATORYDAY, BUYBACKDAY, RATETYPE, RATE, MARGINLEVEL) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeserialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fallbacktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compensatoryday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buybackday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ratetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marginlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, FALLBACKTYPE, COMPENSATORYDAY, BUYBACKDAY, RATETYPE, RATE, MARGINLEVEL from FUND_UNIT_FALLBACK_ORG
